title: Kamisu Reina wa Koko ni Chiru - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Dark   Death   Delusions   Depression   Episodic   Fanaticism   Female Protagonist   Imaginary Friend   Interconnected Storylines   Manipulative Characters   Multiple Identities   Multiple POV   Multiple Protagonists   Murders   Non-linear Storytelling   Past Plays a Big Role   Revenge   R*pe   Shoujo-Ai Subplot   Suicides   Unreliable Narrator
author: Mikage Eiji
description:
Reina Kamisu is a friend of loners, a slayer of families, a savior of worlds, and a killer of lovers—and she is absurdly beautiful. Who is she and what are her intentions? The search for her true identity begins with Fumi Saito, a lonely girl student whose only friend and support in life is Reina, as she is accused of things she did not do…


This is a story of delusions, despair and destructive beauty.

The series consists of two volumes titled “Kamisu Reina wa Koko ni Iru” (Kamisu Reina Is Here) and “Kamisu Reina wa Koko ni Chiru” (Kamisu Reina Disperses Here).>
